reviewText: I liked the video however it is very short in length. I guess I was just expecting more.

I have used this short video with students and staff, workshops and prevention trainings.  It has been the most singularly powerful reminder that conflict begins with words and must end before more of our students feel so overwhelmed that they explode.

I commend the maker of this film for this glimpse as the root cause for youth violence that WE CAN DO SOMETHING ABOUT!  Thank you!
